thread.title: Lisa Wilkinson gushes over Ethan Turnbull's Instagram | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lisa Wilkinson gushes over Ethan Turnbull's Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Jody Phan For Daily Mail Australia
title: Lisa Wilkinson gushes over Ethan Turnbull's Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 84 shares But Lisa, who admitted she became 'sidetracked' by Ethan's racy social media snaps, defended her actions. 'This is just research,' the mother-of-three said, while Deborah called it 'investigative journalism'. Awkward: Lisa's co-hosts, including Tim Gilbert, was left feeling uncomfortable while the 57-year-old scrolled through the male model's social media snaps 'He is quite the dish!' The Today host wasn't shy about expressing her feelings towards the 24-year-old, who made headlines after rescuing a group of children in New York overnight 'Perving': Co-host Tim said Lisa's actions could be 'bordering on perving,' while she insisted it was merely 'research' Richard Wilkins also appeared embarrassed by his co-stars' behaviour. 'Settle down, girls,' the 62-year-old reporter could be heard saying in the background. Meanwhile, Lisa appeared to still be scrolling through Ethan's photos on her phone, urging women in the audience to 'follow' him. 'Settle down, girls': Richard Wilkins appeared unimpressed by Lisa and newsreader Deborah Knight's behaviour, urging them to 'settle down' 'If you're a hot-blooded woman under the age of 25, I'd suggest following him on Instagram,' she laughed. 'That'll keep your Wednesday happy,' she added as a shirtless image of Ethan was shared on-screen. Ethan - an Australian living in the US - was hailed a 'hero' after he and a friend saved seven children from drowning in a freezing pond. 'If you're a hot-blooded woman under the age of 25, I'd suggest following him on Instagram,' Lisa told her viewers 'Hero': The US-based male model made headlines overnight after he and a friend heroically rescued a group of children from a freezing pond The kids had been taking selfies on the ice when the surface collapsed under them. Ethan and his pal stepped in and pulled the children out of the freezing water. Meanwhile, this has not been the first time Lisa has fawned over an attractive male while live on-air. Last week, the former magazine editor revealed she 'wouldn't mind' being chased down the street by Rhys Brown, a burly tradie who appeared on the show as a guest. 'What a nice guy': Meanwhile, it's not the first time Lisa has gushed over an attractive male while live on-air, with the host openly expressing her feelings about a burly tradie named Rhys
